Attributes.description: Classic work in the history, philosophy, rhetoric, and sociology of science, and the development of a unified science and technology studies. Required for all students in the STS Program. This course is co-taught.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: (Enrolment in STS Program or permssion of the STS Advisory Committee.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Mon, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 17:00
